body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
start powershell from inside powershell in the latest nanoserver docker
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
it should work

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
throws a null reference exception
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->


title: SetModulePath throws a NullReference Exception if getting Program files returns null
